title: Drug Gang Vengeance
description: THE DRUG GANG IS BACK!  IT’S TIME TO PAY FOR YOUR SINS…  Drug Gang Vengeance is the sequel to the bestselling crime thriller Drug Gang.  John Kennedy is on his way out of a life of crime in Sydney, when he is hunted down by drug gang The Brotherhood. This leads to a spiral of vengeance and violence that stretches right around the globe.  PART TWO OF THE DRUG GANG SERIES.
author: Neil Walker
